name: Cancellation of invitations for bids or requests for proposals
text: §103D-308  Cancellation of invitations for bids or requests for proposals.  An invitation for bids, a request for proposals, or other solicitation may be canceled, or any or all bids or proposals may be rejected in whole or in part as may be specified in the solicitation, when it is in the best interests of the governmental body which issued the invitation, request, or other solicitation, in accordance with rules adopted by the policy board.  The reasons therefor shall be made part of the contract file. [L Sp 1993, c 8, pt of §2; am L 1997, c 352, §9]
